job.title: Clinical Research Coordinator
job.description:
Hours: M-F -40 Hours a week!
Contract: 6 Months
JOB DETAILS:
Data Entry, Administrative needs - i.e. Filing, set-up for upcoming appts, organizing documentation. Study Coordinator experience, takes initiative and jump into busy site - full scope of recruitment to retention, good communicator.
REQUIRED:
Prior clinical research or research experience
Experience speaking with patients and coordinating documents/appointment scheduling and handling of medical records
EDC Data Entry experience
